title: At least 18 dead after a massive explosion destroyed a hotel in Havana, Cuba
content:
1. At least 18 dead after a massive explosion destroyed a hotel in Havana, Cuba  CNN
  2. Explosion at Cuba's Hotel Saratoga leaves at least 8 dead, official says  Fox News
  3. Powerful explosion at upscale hotel in Havana, Cuba, kills at least 8 people  CBS News
  4. Live updates: Hotel Saratoga explosion in Havana, Cuba  CNN
  5. Historic Cuban hotel destroyed in explosion  WFAA
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
